item.title: Tanzanian pupils' perspectives on the "Don't Touch Me" song: recall, demonstration and understanding of a police-led sexual violence awareness intervention
item.description:
Authors: Nemes & Rwabishugi
Journal: Educational Dimension

Child sexual violence (CSV) is a critical issue in Tanzania, with reported cases rising significantly. This qualitative study examines the perspectives of Tanzanian pupils on the "Don't Touch Me" song, which was used by Police Gender and Children's Desk officers in a child sexual violence awareness intervention in Chamwino District.
